source.sqlReaderQuery:
EXEC admin_btc.usp_CargaInicialLogEjecucionEtapa 'ARG'
EXEC admin_btc.usp_CargaInicialLogEjecucionTabla 'ARG'

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

EXEC admin_btc.usp_CargaInicialLogEjecucionEtapa 'CHL'
EXEC admin_btc.usp_CargaInicialLogEjecucionTabla 'CHL'

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

EXEC admin_btc.usp_CargaInicialLogEjecucionEtapa 'COL'
EXEC admin_btc.usp_CargaInicialLogEjecucionTabla 'COL'

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

UPDATE admin_btc.LogEjecucionEtapa SET Estado='PENDIENTE'
WHERE Periodo=CONVERT(VARCHAR(11),DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),120) AND IDEtapa IN ('DIMENSIONCHL','FACTAUDITORIACHL')

UPDATE admin_btc.LogEjecucionTabla SET Estado='PENDIENTE'
WHERE Periodo=CONVERT(VARCHAR(11),DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),120) AND Tabla IN ('FacSgVentaFormaPago','FacSgCierreCaja','FacSgDeposito','FacSgCierreCajaChica','FacSgMatrizAuditoria','Porcentual','PorcentualCentroCosto','ArticuloBodega') AND Pais='CHL'

--Control de Cargas
DELETE FROM admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
WHERE FechaPeriodo = CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE) AND Proceso = 'AUDITORIA CHILE'

INSERT INTO admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
SELECT CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE),'AUDITORIA CHILE',DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),NULL,0

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

--Control de Cargas
UPDATE admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
SET FechaHasta = DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()), Estado = 1
WHERE FechaPeriodo =  CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE) AND Proceso = 'AUDITORIA CHILE'

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

WHERE Periodo=CONVERT(VARCHAR(11),DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),120) AND Tabla IN ('FacSgPorcentual','FacSgPorcentualCentroCosto','FacSgVentaFormaPago','FacSgCierreCaja','FacSgDeposito','FacSgCierreCajaChica','FacSgMatrizAuditoria','FacSgMatrizAuditoriaAcumulada') and IDCadenaSistemaGerente!=29

--Control de Cargas
TRUNCATE TABLE admin_btc.CargaDataFactory

INSERT INTO admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
SELECT CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE),'CARGA VENTA-CAR-PLANTA',DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),NULL,0

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

--Control de Cargas
UPDATE admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
SET FechaHasta = DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()), Estado = 1
WHERE FechaPeriodo =  CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE) AND Proceso = 'CARGA USO CONSUMO ECU'

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

--Control de Cargas
UPDATE admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
SET FechaHasta = DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()), Estado = 1
WHERE FechaPeriodo =  CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE) AND Proceso = 'CARGA VENTA-CAR-PLANTA'

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM admin_btc.CargaDataFactory WHERE Proceso = 'PROCESO SSAS VENTA-CAR-PLANTA' AND Estado = 1)
	SELECT 'OK' AS Resultado
ELSE
	SELECT 'REINTENTAR' AS Resultado

--Control de Cargas
